clues.question: The Simpsons is now over 20 years old and still going. How many episodes have there been as of the end of Season 32 (1989-2021)?
The 'pole of inaccessibility' refers to the furthest point from a coastline. How far away from the cost is North America's pole of inaccessibility, found in South Dakota?
As of his latest album Donda (2021), how many singles did Kanye West release as a lead or featured artist?
In February 2021, what percentage of US individuals who own at least one smartphone own an Apple iPhone?
The term 'ticker-tape parade' came from New Yorkers' celebration of the Statue of Liberty's dedication, which occurred in which year?
As of September 13, 2021, the city of San Francisco has how many intersections with a traffic signal?
In 2020, what percentage of US women used tampons?
